And he was so looking forward to seeing Mr. McCrary in gym class - he had been impressed as hell with the huge size of the man at that first dinner, and now he'd get to see him up close and personal, and maybe even in gym shorts.

Inside the gym doors, Mr. McCrary was waiting for them. "If you're not in shorts already, into the locker room and grab some," he said in his deep baritone. "The rest of you put your bags on the side and come sit for a minute." Matt, alread in the usual OSB school outfit of sweat shorts and t-shirt, put his bag down and dropped to the floor near Todd, and another boy he'd met named Logan. Logan, like Todd, had already been at OSB for a couple of years, and was over 400 pounds, Matt was sure.

"Right," said Mr. McCrary, once the few not in shorts had returned, "welcome to gym class. For those of you new here, this will be a gym class probably very different any you've had before. For those of you who were in grade 8 here last year, this will also be different. The Headmaster and the Board of Governors have expressed some concerns about the mobility of some of the student body, and they've hired me to help keep you all moving as you grow. Some people argue that you can't stay mobile as you grow huge, but I'm here to show, and teach, you differently. How many of you can do this?" he asked, and dropped into a martial arts stance. He then jogged about twenty feet, did a forward roll, came back up on his feet and did a jumping jack.

The gym's wooden floor resounded with a heavy "boom" as his 900 pounds landed back on his feet. "Anybody want to try it?" he asked, standing and grinning. "No? Well, I don't expect you to do all that, but I am here to help you stay fit and mobile while you achieve your body's potential. Anybody here swim? Lift weights? Do sumo? Martial arts? Those things I showed you are all from those 'fat guy' sports. One of the things I had the school do when they hired me was upgrade the weight room, and the pool, and get the mats for a proper martial arts studio and sumo ring. We'll spend a lot of time on those in class, and I want you to come other days too."

Matt's brain was still boggling from the sight of a 900 pound man rolling back up on his feet - he scarcely heard the rest of McCrary's talk. Suddenly the whole class was up on its feet and headed towards the weight room, where brand new benches welcomed them. McCrary led them all through a short stretching routine. Matt was surprised that he could bench almost as much as Todd, though Logan was stronger - he said he'd spent the summer at football camp. Conor, who was much rounder than Matt, struggled to bench even 100 pounds.

Then it was into the showers, where Matt could see that Conor looked to be all soft fat, while Logan had something of the husky football player showing in his big arms and shoulders. Wolfing down the Salisbury steak, chicken burgers and broccoli in cheese sauce on offer, Matt decided that he would go to the weight room or the pool on his 'off-gym' days - he had enjoyed McCrary's instruction,and the feeling of working out.

An hour's gorging past, it was off to history and science class for Matt and his classmates.

Most of them are shorter than he is.

Todd, meanwhile, is in the midst of the weight class with the most boys in it, so doesn't do so well in all his matches. “The elevators are old and slow, so the Principal reserves them for staff and prefects. There are also a few very fat guys who aren’t prefects who have permission to use them. If you get fat enough, I’m sure the Principal will give you a key.”

"Plus, it's under glass, so if a little food spills on it, it's easy to clean, and no damage to the electronics. Ah, here we are. Matthew Butterworth, grade nine, tuition paid, board paid, clothing fee paid, laptop paid - it all looks good. You're in room 378, third floor. Your roommate has already signed in, so he may be there - he's Bruce Crawford - or he may have already made it to the cafeteria."

"The cafeteria seems really important here, huh?"

"Oh yes, our cafeteria is the heart and soul of Obesity School. Food is always available, and lots of events happen there too. There's a stage, and study spaces, and, well, you'll see."

"Food is always available?"

"Oh yes, 24/7, all you can eat, and included in the fees for your board. Feel free to tuck in whenever you're hungry."

"So this is not a weight-loss school?" asks Matt, the question that had been bothering him since meeting Pots the first time, and a natural question for a boy who has always been teased about being fat.

"Oh no child, this is a school for boys who are big and want to stay big or get bigger. There's no social pressure to get smaller here. My goodness, didn't you notice how big Two-Ton was? All of our boys are big!"

"So, nobody going to tease me about being fat?"

"Matt, how much do you weigh? Better, jump on that scale over there and let's have your first official weight."

“I’m Matt, and I weigh 250.”

“Welcome, Matt, to the best school on earth for fat boys!” beamed the bigger of the two hallway cops. “I’m Farley, and I’m the chief of campus police around these parts. This morning, when Ms. Peach in the office weighed all of us, I was 605 pounds!”

600 pounds! thinks Matt. “You’re huge!” he stammers in surprise.

“Yup, finally topped 600 pounds!” says Farley, grinning. “And this is just the beginning,” he continues, gesturing to his awe-inspiring gut, “I’ve got plans.”

“600 pounds!” Matt says out loud this time.

“Cool, ain’t it?” Farley says. “And 6-0-5 is just the beginning! I’m going to have a GOOD year!” He pounds his absurdly huge teenage gut with one thickly padded hand as the other campus cop grins.

“Fats means he’s really going to put on weight!” the other guy interpreted (unnecessarily) for Matt.

“Yup!” adds Farley, grinning. “This is the year I stop growing ‘up’ and start growing ‘out’ - by the graduation, my ‘inner porker’ and I will have transformed this fat body!!”

Matt is dazed by this announcement. Transformed? Transformed into what? Farley - or ‘Fats’ as the other cop called him - is already the biggest human being Matt has ever seen! How big will he be once he’s ‘transformed’? How much more weight could he possibly gain?.

“I can see you don’t believe me,” remarks Farley, taking Matt’s stunned look for disbelief, “but I intend to eat and grow this year like never before. After all, there’s good reasons I’m called ‘Fats’ around here.”

“There sure are!” jokes the other fat campus cop. “I’m Thomas, by the way,” he goes on, “known around here as Tom Ton, even though I’m lighter than Fats. Though maybe not for long...”

“You say that every year!” retorts Fats. “But you haven’t beat me yet.”

“Yeah, well, this might be the year,” Tom Ton replies, “I can just feel a growth spurt coming on...”

Matt’s punch-drunk feeling has not gone away with this fat boy double act. Trying to regain his sense of balance, he asks Tom Ton, “How big are you? Are you two roommates?”

info.brief_description: Matt's new school is a haven for fat guys!  Will he fit in?
info.description:
Matt has just arrived at his new school, in a rural town in Oklahoma. There, he finds out that he isn't the fattest kid, and he isn't the only one who likes gaining, or other guys.

***************


This is fiction (obviously), but not complete fantasy. No spells, wishes, or anything like that. No fairy Godparents. However, weight gain doesn't have to be realistic. I know, confusing, right? Just have fun with it!

Also, sex is okay ONLY when the participants are at least sixteen years old. Anything outside that realm, Iincluding INAPROPRIATE TOUCHING, will get your chapter deleted.
